CustomField.formula:
IF( ISPICKVAL(Access_Type__c, "Periodic"), (TotalPrice * Period_In_Months__c ) - (-((TotalPrice * Period_In_Months__c ) * Calculated_Price_Adjustment__c)),
IF( ISPICKVAL(Access_Type__c, "Monthly"), (TotalPrice * 24) - ((TotalPrice * 24 ) * (-Calculated_Price_Adjustment__c)),
TotalPrice - (TotalPrice * (-Calculated_Price_Adjustment__c)) ) )
CustomField.label: Total Calculated Price
